entry.name: switchTabsOnHover
entry.label: Whether to switch between menu tabs by hovering them.

entry.name: showAppsByName
entry.label: Whether to display specific application names instead of their generic names (e.g. Dolphin instead of File Manager).

entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon used in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: favorites
entry.label: List of general favorites. Supported values are menu id's (usually .desktop file names), special URLs that expand into default applications (e.g. preferred://browser), document URLs and KPeople contact URIs.

entry.name: favoritesPortedToKAstats
entry.label: Are the favorites ported to use KActivitiesStats to allow per-activity favorites

entry.name: systemApplications
entry.label: List of applications at the top of the "Computer" tab.

entry.name: menuItems
entry.label: The menu tabs to show.

entry.name: alphaSort
entry.label: Whether to sort menu contents alphabetically or use manual/system sort order.

entry.name: favoritesFlow
entry.label: Favorites flow direction. Top to bottom (columns first) or left to right (rows first).

entry.name: favoritesColumns
entry.label: Number of columns in Favorites view.

entry.name: favoritesAlwaysMaxColumns
entry.label: Whether to always use maximum amount of columns in Favorites view.

entry.name: favoritesIconSize
entry.label: Icon size in Favorites view.

entry.name: favoritesLabelsPosition
entry.label: Position of the labels in Favorites view.

entry.name: favoritesEnableSubtitles
entry.label: Whether to display subtitles in Favorites view.

entry.name: applicationsUseFavoritesConfig
entry.label: Whether to always use maximum amount of columns in Applications view.

entry.name: applicationsFlow
entry.label: Applications flow direction. Top to bottom (columns first) or left to right (rows first).

entry.name: applicationsColumns
entry.label: Number of columns in Applications view.

entry.name: applicationsAlwaysMaxColumns
entry.label: Whether to always use maximum amount of columns in Applications view.

entry.name: applicationsIconSize
entry.label: Icon size in Applications view.

entry.name: applicationsLabelsPosition
entry.label: Position of the labels in Applications view.

entry.name: applicationsEnableSubtitles
entry.label: Whether to display subtitles in Applications view.

entry.name: menuWidth
entry.label: Width of the menu.

entry.name: menuHeight
entry.label: Height of the menu.

entry.name: allowDragResize
entry.label: Whether to allow resizing the menu with the mouse (using alt/meta/etc + RMB).

entry.name: verticalSelectionMargin
entry.label: Vertical selection margin.

entry.name: horizontalSelectionMargin
entry.label: Horizontal selection margin.

entry.name: itemHorizontalMargin
entry.label: Horizontal item margin (inside selection).

entry.name: itemVerticalMargin
entry.label: Vertical item margin (inside selection).

entry.name: hideAllSubtitles
entry.label: Whether to hide subtitles on all pages.

entry.name: iconSizeListViews
entry.label: Icon size in list views.
